text: Syro-Malabar Catholic Eparchy of Adilabad was created by Pope John Paul II on 23 July 1999. The first bishop, Mar Joseph Kunnath, CMI, was ordained bishop on 6 October 1999 at which time the diocese also was inaugurated. ==External links== * Syro-Malabar Catholic Diocese of Adilabad at Catholic-Hierarchy Category:Syro-Malabar Catholic dioceses Category:Christian organizations established in 1999 Category:Christianity in Telangana Category:1999 establishments in India
title: Syro-Malabar Catholic Eparchy of Adilabad
